title: Olympic Games Tokyo 2020 – The Official Video Game Download
description:
The Olympic Games are back, and this time it’s your chance for glory Whether you play with friends, family, or go for gold on the global leaderboards , this is a party game that anyone can pick up and enjoy Prepare to unleash the competitor within as you create your athlete, customize their skills and pick the perfect costume .
Why settle for standard sportswear when you can take center stage as a pirate , astronaut or cowboy Choose between 18 fun-fueled sporting events—from Tennis and Football to the 100m, Basketball and Boxing—there’s always a record to beat and a score to settle. Going for gold has never been this much fun

system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTS 450, 1 GB | AMD Radeon HD 5770, 1 GB
